description:
def reboot_instance(self, context, instance_uuid, reboot_type="SOFT"):

reboot_instance is called passing instance_id when the third parameter required is instance_uuid.

https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/master/nova/compute/manager.py#L745

title: reboot_instance() is called passing instance id

def reboot_instance(self, context, instance_uuid, reboot_type="SOFT"):
